# dataType

**Instance Property**

A data format for the tensors you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataType: MTLTensorDataType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTensorDataType/float32].
title: dataType
